a página Suppliers Acesse a página Investor Relation Publications Acesse a página ESG Ir para o rodapé ALT + T Ir para a página inicial Ir para página sobre Acessibilidade Aumentar tamanho de fonte do site Diminuir tamanho de fonte do site Trocar entre modo de alto contraste e modo normal Abrir pesquisa do site Indonésia Governance Corporate Secretary Foto:PT Vale / Image Bank Foto:PT Vale / Image Bank Corporate Secretary The appointment of the Corporate Secretary is regulated under POJK No.35/POJK.04/2014 on Corporate Secretary of Issuers or Public Companies (“POJK 35”) and IDX Regulation No.1-E on Disclosure of Information Requirement. The Corporate Secretary is responsible to the Board of Directors and is appointed/dismissed based on a Decree of the Board of Directors with approval from the Board of Commissioners. The Corporate Secretary has a strategic function as a liaison between the Company and the shareholders, OJK, IDX and other stakeholders. Duties and responsibilities of the Corporate Secretary refer to the Charter of the Corporate Secretary, last amended and approved by the Board of Directors on October 25, 2024. Download the Charter of the Corporate Secretary Currently, Anggun Kara Nataya serves as Corporate Secretary after being appointed based on Directors' Decree No. 12/SK-DIR/2025 dated 26 September 2025. The appointment of the Corporate Secretary is effective from 26 September 2025, and has been notified to the OJK and IDX by letter No. 02072/CORS-J/IX/2025 dated 30 September 2025. Foto:PT Vale / Image Bank Corporate Secretary Anggun Kara Nataya Anggun Kara Nataya is a corporate lawyer with 20 years of professional experience, specializing in corporate law, mining sector, and project developments. She commenced her career at an internationally affiliated law firm, where she spent five years gaining comprehensive experience in the energy sector, corporate law, capital market transactions, cross-border transactions, project developments and regulatory compliance. This early exposure provided her with a strong foundation in handling complex corporate and legal issues within a global business context. Nataya joined PT Vale Indonesia Tbk in 2011 as a Senior Legal Counsel, providing comprehensive legal support on corporate governance, mining operations, dispute resolutions and large-scale project developments. Demonstrating consistent leadership and legal acumen, Nataya was promoted as a Legal Manager in 2020. In 2021, Nataya assumed the role of Head of Legal Department. She has played a pivotal role in PT Vale’s major milestones, including divestment and Contract of Work extension. Nataya holds a law degree from the University of Indonesia, where she was named the most achieving student in 2006. Her professional leadership and commitment to her field have been recognized through the prestigious In-House Counsel Elite award by HukumOnline, which she received in 2023-2025. Known for her pragmatic and strategic approach, she consistently delivers legal solutions that balance business needs with regulatory requirements, contributing significantly to the sustainable growth of PT Vale. Corporate Secretary Anggun Kara Nataya Akses Corporate Secretary Anggun Kara Nataya Age - Nationality Indonesian Legal Basis Appointment Appointed as Corporate Secretary by the Directors' Decree No. 12/SK-DIR/2025 dated 26 September 2025. The appointment of the Corporate Secretary is effective from 26 September 2025, and has been notified to the OJK and IDX by letter No. 02072/CORS-J/IX/2025 dated 30 September 2025. Education History Bachelor of Law, University of Indonesia Work Experience Head of Legal Department, PT Vale Indonesia Tbk, 2021-2025 Legal Manager, PT Vale Indonesia Tbk, 2020-2021 Senior Legal Counsel, PT Vale Indonesia Tbk, 2011-2020 Find out more Click here to see our Board of Directors Check out our Corporate Governance Policy Learn more about our Risk Management Click here to see our Whistleblowing System See our Committees Photo: Marcelo Coelho Vale Investors Atualizar preferências de cookies ESG E-Procurement Whistleblower Channel Suppliers Investor Relation Publications Board of Directors Our Policy Acessibilidade Investors Dividend Capital Market Supporting Institutions and/or Professionals Financial Highlights General Meeting of Shareholders Shares Information © Vale | Todos os direitos reservados.
